query:
SELECT 
  s.siteNumber,
  sc.name as centre_name,
  COUNT(suc.categoryId) as category_count
FROM sites s
JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.siteId
WHERE sc.name LIKE '%Highlands%'
GROUP BY s.id, s.siteNumber, sc.name
ORDER BY s.siteNumber;

  COUNT(suc.categoryId) as category_count

LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.siteId
WHERE sc.name LIKE '%Highlands%'
GROUP BY s.id, s.siteNumber, sc.name
